wikipedia_page.main: Henry Scott Riddell (23 September 1798 – 30 July 1870) was a Scottish poet and songwriter.  In the Scottish Orpheus, a collection of songs of Scotland by Adam Hamilton, he is credited with writing Scotland Yet and The Dowie Dens O' Yarrow.

response: * Henry Scott Riddell (1798–1870), the poet, was buried at Teviothead and is commemorated by a monument on a nearby hill.
